Member Function Documentation

void brics_3d::INormalEstimation::estimateNormals ( PointCloud3D *  pointCloud,
NormalSet3D *  estimatedNormals 
)

Estimates normals in a point clouds.

Each ith point in the cloud with have a corresponding ith normal.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudThe input point cloud. This data will not be modified.
[out]estimatedNormalsResulting set of estimated normals.
